html:
12.6.20  5:30 am   do you own potatoes

      no. always rent potatoes

12.6.20  4:54 am   If you could make sure one thing is left behind on earth for aliens to find after humans are gone, what would it be?

      a road

12.6.20  3:40 am   what should i do for my birthday besides listen to your glorious music

      walk to a new town

12.6.20  2:26 am   what was the bad thing you did

      underestimated how great the great plains are

12.6.20  1:45 am   Have you invented a new art form, at least for a solo artist?

      it seems impossible to do art without letting new forms be invented

12.6.20  12:38 am   do you believe in music genres?

      on an extremely short-term basis. like a few moments maybe

12.5.20  11:27 pm   If u want to work on something BIG would u have to write down what u are doing for it or what  your goals are, then one day accomplish it? But you'd write or type it, but then you would actually have to do it... and would I have to make videos or recording about what I'm doing and how I'm doing it and how it's going so far??????? Questions, questions... that no one knows the answer to, but, maybe everyone knows the answer to.... I have all of these thoughts... and I want to explain them, but if I'm stuck on one thought, I could forget the rest... what should I do??.... 

      writing things down is very good. it can help. ultimately the world will still be a total jungle, but it will help

12.5.20  11:24 pm   do your songs actually have meaning

     do they mean anything to you

     or are they just random

      no

12.5.20  10:13 pm   is 52898 prime?? tryna win a bet

      it is not. this is very obvious, because it ends in 8

12.5.20  9:53 pm   Do you are have stupid?

      no but i'm getting some

12.5.20  8:53 pm   how to happy?

      have you tried screaming at the sky

12.5.20  7:42 pm   Why is it so hard to make any sense?

      because there is so much sense out there that's already been made, it can be intimidating

12.5.20  7:00 pm   what is peas

      nothing. "nothing is peas", that is the official slogan of peas. some people find that to be hypocritical, but that's just the nature of the business

12.5.20  6:51 pm   How was the music production (recording/mixing/making things sound not crappy) learning curve for you? 

      maddening, saddening, ...... gladdening,

12.5.20  5:27 pm   What do you classify as a "good question"

      an average question

12.5.20  4:33 pm   Are you dumb

      yes and no

12.5.20  3:20 pm   Do you have a generic answer to every question that's been answered?

      no

12.5.20  2:44 pm   why are you so darn relatable

      it's possible that you and i live on the same planet

12.5.20  1:21 pm   Is your next project grander than History of the entire world that it's taking so long?

     no

12.5.20  12:28 pm   What editing software do you use in your videos? Did you stop making videos because it went out of date?

      this is remarkably similar to what has happened, at least if you look at it in the short term. But in the longer term, what is really happening is, i am developing an all new process for making videos. The reason this process development always takes a long time for me is because apparently i have some kind of brain problem where i pathologically make everything more complicated with each passing second. I also feel i have a special talent for making things very very simple, but unfortunately i can only seem to do that every 10 seconds, which is not enough to offset the rate of complexification

12.5.20  11:15 am   you say that you tend to come up with lyrics and melody at the same time; HOW do you manage to repeatedly have multiple ideas simultaneously‽ i can't manage it! i just end up having to come up with a melody for the lurics i've just written or some lyrics for the melody i've written

      i find the ideas are about 10 times stronger when the lyrics and melody are born together. as for how to make this happen, sometimes you have to 'set the scene'. think of a scene. usually at that point the songs just start spewing out. it's a cool new trick i've learned

12.5.20  10:09 am   im so confused about everything. how to stop being confused

      write everything down

12.5.20  9:58 am   how do you get through hyper self-critique when you just start a thing?

      the only way is to make a deal with myself that i will also do 999 other things after this thing, to make up for it

12.5.20  8:25 am   is the fragrance of music the same of art?

      no

12.5.20  7:33 am   How is3d animation going?

      pretty good, considering it has ruined my life

12.5.20  6:26 am   Has interacting with fans and making music made you into this witty spontaneous guy with a new way to look at things or have you always thought that way?

      if i'm really that spontaneous, then why do i edit everything so much and never do anything live

12.5.20  5:36 am   have you ever thought of making an album? 

      yes but i changed my mind because i realized that i don't like albums. i love songs, and albums usually ruin all the songs on them, for me

12.5.20  4:07 am   when you perform live do you think you'll play new canaan?

      it's possible

12.5.20  3:44 am   how do you tolerate the inherent pointlessness of life?

      that reminds me, i was going to ask how you tolerate having 75 middle names

12.5.20  2:10 am   opinion on anteaters?

      sometimes i wonder if they drink ants also

12.5.20  1:27 am   Why are you so funny?

      that's due to extreme levels of normalcy i possess

12.5.20  12:36 am   Would you please tell us of your life story and struggles some time?

      yes

12.4.20  11:59 pm   12.3.20  9:28 pm if you're changing the music production process, does that mean we'll have to wait another year after this video before the next one?

      that all depends on how big of an idiot i am

12.4.20  10:58 pm   before you do something, do you think of the outcome

      sometimes

12.4.20  9:58 pm   Do you actually sleep?

     yes

     Your responses are all spaced hours apart during the day and night.

      no they are not. but the questions are. the answers are answered at a different time from the question. for example, the time now is Saturday, December 5, 2020 8:34:09 PM. the reason i don't normally put 2 dates and 2 times on each question is to prevent the possible explosion of the reader's head cranium

12.4.20  8:49 pm   how many braincells do you have 

      oh several half dozen or so

12.4.20  7:51 pm   once you release the first new video, will the video afterwards take another year to come out?

      that all depends on how big of an idiot i am

12.4.20  6:33 pm   Why do you like music?

      i don't know. it likes me

12.4.20  5:13 pm   Why is 3 such an appealing amount of things to us?

      it's the smallest number of items that allows you to create a pattern and break it

12.4.20  5:10 pm   Do you have a favorite type of genre of music? If so what is it?

      regular

12.4.20  4:39 pm   what inspires you?

      the fabric and fibers of our world today

12.4.20  3:52 pm   what is your major malfuntion?

      the human brain has an important feature, called the infinity warning. it warns you whenever you are trying to do infinity. it says, 'warning, you are trying to do infinity, which is not possible so please stop now so your feelings don't get hurt from how impossible it would be to do infinity', well that part of my brain is unfortunately missing

12.4.20  2:12 pm   Trump or biden

      i can never remember which one is which

12.4.20  1:33 pm   "oh no wear is my pink tutu" what does this mean

      404

12.4.20  12:32 pm   what inspired "At The Airport Terminal"?

      airport terminals

12.4.20  12:06 pm   what do you still have to do on the next video?

      make it good

12.4.20  9:31 am   do you fear the bread uprising?

      no

12.4.20  9:19 am   which animal would be cool to scale up to the size of a zebra?

      mini zebra

12.4.20  8:34 am   Hey men, just wanted to say that I really love your songs and videos. Your talent is insane as your videos. Hope you are doing alright!
Question: How did you start learning music

     i don't remember

     and editing?

      i found the 'scissor' tool in the computer

12.4.20  7:56 am   in your video 'at the airport terminal', what does the 't' mean in 0:44-0:46 (video length)?

      terminal
